thread.title: Watch Stephen Colbert Cover Talking Heads’ “Once in a Lifetime”
thread.title_full: Watch Stephen Colbert Cover Talking Heads’ “Once in a Lifetime”

author: Pitchfork
title: Watch Stephen Colbert Cover Talking Heads’ “Once in a Lifetime”
text:
Watch Stephen Colbert Cover Talking Heads’ “Once in a Lifetime” Photos by Neilson Barnard/Getty Images, Clayton Call/Redferns 
Last night, Stephen Colbert made an appearance at a fundraiser for the Montclair Film Festival in Montclair, New Jersey. Backed by a live band, the “Late Show” host covered the Talking Heads ’ 1981 single “Once in a Lifetime.” Check out footage below via Stereogum . (Colbert’s David Byrne dance moves are definitely on point.) 
Here’s the original:
